For $ p=1,2,\ldots,10$ let $ S_p$ be the sum of the first $ 40$ terms of the arithmetic progression whose first term is $ p$ and whose common difference is $ 2p-1$; then $ S_1+S_2+\cdots+S_{10}$ is\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 80000
\qquad \textbf{(B)}\ 80200
\qquad \textbf{(C)}\ 80400
\qquad \textbf{(D)}\ 80600
\qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 80800$
